activities: The following is a general description of how Nexeo Solutions, LLC and its affiliates ("Nexeo") use personal information obtained from the EU: (1) Nexeo uses personal information pertaining to present and former personnel of Nexeo in connection with the management and operation of Nexeo, making services and benefits available to such personnel, and maintaining contact with former personnel.  (2) Nexeo uses personal information obtained from or relating to prospective and current clients of Nexeo and their personnel to provide and offer goods and services to such clients and prospects and to fulfull its obligations pertaining to such goods and services.  (3) To a limited extent, Nexeo may use personal information pertaining to members of the general public for the purpose of making certain information resources available to such persons.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
